VARIABLE.NAME: Theorem_Appendix
VARIABLE.VALUE: Appendix of the Proof with link __lt__a href__eq____qu__http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Absolute_Konvergenz__qu__ target__eq____qu__blank__qu____gt__Wikipedia__lt__/a__gt__

STEPDEF.VALUE: Es sei __math__D subset CC__math__ und __math__a__co__b in D__co__ alpha__co__ beta in RR__co__ alpha__lt__ beta__math__ und __math__gamma_{ab}: [ alpha__co__ beta ] -__gt__ D__math__ eine stetige Abbildung mit __math__gamma_{ab} ( alpha) __eq__a__math__ und __math__gamma_{ab} (beta) __eq__ b__math__
Es gibt eine stetige Abbildung __math__gamma:[ 0__co__1] -__gt__ D__math__ mit __math__gamma(0) __eq__a__math__ und __math__gamma(1) __eq__b__math__ und __math__Sp(gamma)__eq__Sp(gamma_{ab})__math__.
Parametertransformation __math__varphi__math__ des Weges __math__gamma_{a__co__b}__math__
Parametertransformation __math__varphi__math__ des Weges __math__gamma__math__
Parametertransformation __math__gamma__math__
Definition __math__gamma__math__
Definition __math__gamma_{a__co__b}__math__
__math__varphi__math__ bijektiv
__math__varphi__math__ injektiv
__math__varphi * gamma_{a__co__b}__math__
__math__Sp(gamma)__eq__ Sp(varphi)__math__

Waehle die bijektive__co__ stetige Abbildung __math__varphi__math__ mit: __math__varphi : [0__co__ 1] -__gt__ [alpha__co__ beta]__co__ t -__gt__ varphi (t) :__eq__ alpha + t (beta - alpha) __eq__ (1 - t) alpha + t beta__math__

Waehle die bijektive__co__ stetige Abbildung __math__varphi__math__ mit: __math__varphi : [alpha__co__ beta] -__gt__ [0__co__1]__co__ t -__gt__ varphi (t) :__eq__ alpha + t (beta - alpha) __eq__ (1 - t) alpha + t beta__math__

Waehle die bijektive__co__ stetige Abbildung __math__varphi__math__ mit: __math__varphi : [0__co__ 1] -__gt__ [alpha__co__ beta]__co__ t -__gt__ varphi (t) :__eq__ alpha - t (beta + alpha) __eq__ (1-t) alpha - t beta__math__
__math__gamma:__eq__ gamma_{ab} circ varphi:[0__co__1] -__gt__ D__co__ t -__gt__ gamma (t)__eq__gamma_{ab}(varphi(t)) __eq__gamma_{ab}((1-t) alpha+t beta)__math__
__math__gamma:__eq__ varphi circ gamma_{ab}:[0__co__1] -__gt__ D__co__ t -__gt__ gamma (t)__eq__gamma_{ab}(varphi(t)) __eq__gamma_{ab}((1-t) alpha+t beta)__math__
__math__gamma:__eq__ varphi circ gamma_{ab}:[0__co__1] -__gt__ D__co__ t -__gt__ gamma (t)__eq__ varphi(gamma_{ab}(t)) __eq__ (1 - gamma_{ab}(t)) alpha + gamma_{ab}(t) beta__math__
__math__gamma:__eq__ varphi__math__

Waehle die konvergente Folge __math__varphi__math__ mit: __math__varphi : [alpha__co__ beta] -__gt__ [0__co__1]__co__ t -__gt__ varphi (t) :__eq__ alpha + t (beta - alpha) __eq__ (1 - t) alpha + t beta__math__

Waehle die bijektive__CO__ stetige Abbildung __math__varphi__math__ mit: __math__varphi : [0__CO__ 1] -__gt__ [alpha__CO__ beta]__CO__ t -__gt__ varphi (t) :__eq__ alpha + t (beta - alpha) __eq__ (1 - t) alpha + t beta__math__
__math__gamma:__eq__ gamma_{ab} circ varphi:[0__CO__1] -__gt__ D__CO__ t -__gt__ gamma (t)__eq__gamma_{ab}(varphi(t)) __eq__gamma_{ab}((1-t) alpha+t beta)__math__
